title: Explore The Klawset Supply's Vast Array of Supplies
abstract: Explore our premium nail supplies, offering everything you need for professional-quality manicures at home.

product.title: Nail Drill Set - 69.99
product.description: Professional nail drill kit comes with its built-in 3000mAh rechargeable battery, being charged for about 2-3 hours,the efile nail drill will last up to 8-10 hours. 10 different drill bits and 6 sanding bands.
